Package com.intellij.openapi.util.io

Class ByteArraySequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.io.ByteArraySequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteSequence

    public class ByteArraySequence
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteSequence
    A sequence of bytes backed by byte array (or sub-array).

      • getBytes

        public byte [] getBytes()
        Implementation method.
        Returns:
        Internal buffer, irrespective myOffset or myLen. May be larger than length().

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset()
        Implementation method.
        Returns:
        the offset of the area used for storing bytes in internal buffer.
